0.2.name: wordpress/google-scribe
0.2.description:
Google Scribe is a WordPress Plugin, which allows you to enable Google Scribe to WordPress comment input box. Google Scribe will be activated when the user clicks the comment textarea. It also provides an option for users to disable Google Scribe if they are not interested.

Translation

  • Swedish (Thanks Thomas Persson)
  • Dutch (Thanks Rene of WPwebshop )

The pot file is available with the Plugin. If you are willing to do translation for the Plugin, use the pot file to create the .po files for your language and let me know. I will add it to the Plugin after giving credit to you.

Support

Support for the Plugin is available from the Plugin's home page. If you have any questions or suggestions, do leave a comment there.

Links
